Title: Bombaiyer Bombete
Writer: Rajendra Choudhary (hindi dialogue), Sandip Ray (screenplay), Satyajit Ray (novel)
Actors: Sabyasachi Chakraborty, Parambrata Chatterjee, Bibhu Bhattacharya, Masood Akhtar
Plot: Lalmohan Ganguly's Book Bombaiyer Bombete is made into a Hindi feature film. Thus Feluda, Lalmohanbabu and Topshe goes to Mumbai. Soon a murder takes place in Mumbai. Can Feluda solve the ...
